text: Baluna, â€˜tomara amake jana'o, yadi e kura'ana allahara kacha theke nayila haye thake ebam tomara tara sathe kuphari kara, ara bani isara'ilera ekajana anurupa kitabera ayatera upara saksya diye tate imana anala; ara tomara aud'dhatya prakasa karale, (tahale tomadera parinama ki habe?) Niscaya allaha yalima sampradayake hedayata karena na
